body: You can move through the space of any creature two or more size categories larger than you without provoking attacks of opportunity, and you can share such a creature's space. When sharing a larger opponent's space, you gain cover against all melee and ranged attacks it makes, and it is considered flat-footed for the purposes of any melee or ranged attacks you make against it.
name: Titan's Bane
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Trickster/1st-Tier Trickster Path Abilities/Titans Bane
